a.title: Remote School Board Meetings Until Further Notice
a.span: Remote School Board Meetings Until Further Notice

li.a: NH Certification for Educators and Para-Educators
Remote School Board Meetings Until Further Notice

div.h3:
UPDATED APRIL 16TH: DUE TO THE GOVERNOR'S ANNOUNCEMENT HAMPSTEAD SCHOOL DISTRICT WILL BE STARTING REMOTE LEARNING WITH STUDENTS ON MARCH 18TH AND CONTINUING THROUGH MAY 1st. YOU SHOULD EXPECT A COMMUNICATION ON WHAT IS ASSIGNED THIS WEEK VIA GOOGLE CLASSROOM OR PARENT EMAIL.
You can find remote learning resources at Covid-19 and Remote Learning Information and Resources for Parents and Students
NOTICE: Food Service Operations will be closed during the period of Remote Learning. Please refer to our District Food Service page for a list of resources for our Free & Reduced Lunch Population

div.h2:
The mission of the Hampstead School District
is to provide challenging educational experiences
that prepare all students to succeed
to their individual potential in a changing world.
